DOC.brief_summary: The protocol show prevalence bruxism among group Egyptian child
DOC.brief_title: Prevalence Bruxism Group Preschool Egyptian Children
DOC.detailed_description: Many study do child show prevalence bruxism among different age , report prevalence range 8-31 % general population , prevalence bruxism Egyptian child unknown . Several symptom commonly associate bruxism , include hypersensitive teeth , ache jaw muscle , headache , tooth wear , damage dental restoration ( e.g . crown filling ) damage teeth . However may cause minimal symptom , therefore people may aware condition , study important determine prevalence bruxism preschool Egyptian child
DOC.criteria: 1 . Cooperative child 36 year 2 . Children without Medical problem 3 . Children family accept participate study 1 Children caries posterior teeth
